text: Daniel Ginsberg (born February 4, 1993) is a USA-Israel former Basketball player from New York. == Early Life == Daniel is a Patrick & Henry Community College graduate. He is a former Blue Ridge School basketball player and worked with NBA All-Star Stephon Marbury in Beijing, China. He established a basketball instruction service upon his return to Charlottesville from playing abroad. He holds certifications in both fitness coaching and plant-based nutrition. == Professional Career == Due to two major injuries, he returned to Charlottesville and founded a basketball training business Utrain. In 2016-2017, Ginsberg averaged 10.1ppg, 5.3 asst, 3.1 reb and 2.5 steals for the New England Anchors (ABA). In 2017-2018 Ginsberg averaged 11.2ppg, 5.4apg, 4.1rpg for Hapoel Eilat (Israel). == References == == Other websites == * official website * Twitter * Daniel on YouTube Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:American basketball players Category:Sportspeople from New York (state)
title: Daniel Ginsberg
